title: Designing Practice-Based Learning Strategies for STEM Workforce Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Requires flexible instructional design accommodating adult learners' work schedules and self-directed learning patterns.

learning_goals: Learners can apply five or more effective learning strategies (e.g., concept mapping, problem-solving simulations) to actual project tasks
Learners can diagnose individual learning barriers and develop personalized learning plans with three or more stages using time management tools
Learners can explain the process of solving complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using peer feedback and digital resources (shared whiteboards, collaboration tools)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
